#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,i; 
		cin>>n;
		long long a[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
		sort(a,a+n);
		//for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		//cout<<a[i]<<endl;
		for(i=1;i<n-1;)
		{
			a[i]=a[i]^a[i+1];
			a[i+1]=a[i]^a[i+1];
			a[i]=a[i]^a[i+1];
			i+=2;
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cout<<a[i]<<" ";
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
